howWeHelp.title: How We Help
howWeHelp.seekerDesc: Find steady work with weekly pay. We match you with safe, reputable workplaces.
howWeHelp.employerDesc: Eliminate downtime. Get qualified, verified staff for your peak seasons and projects.

why.title: Why Telliusco?
why.speedDesc: We fill urgent orders quickly so your production never stops.
why.screeningDesc: We verify skills, eligibility, and safety awareness for every candidate.
why.safetyDesc: We prioritize safe work environments and comprehensive orientation.

testimonials.title: What People Say
testimonials.q1: Telliusco helped us staff our warehouse shift in under 24 hours. Incredible speed.
testimonials.q2: I got paid weekly and found a permanent job through them. Highly recommend.
testimonials.q3: Professional, compliant, and easy to work with. They understand our safety needs.

sectionA.title: Jobs Hiring in {city}, {state}

sectionA.note: Weekly pay · Short-term & Long-term · Temp-to-Hire available

sectionB.title: Staffing Services in {city}, {state}
sectionB.problem: Struggling with absenteeism, turnover, or peak season demands in {city}? We provide a reliable workforce pipeline.

services.tempDesc: Fill gaps instantly for seasonal spikes or vacations.
services.tempHireDesc: Try a candidate on the job before making a full-time offer.
services.directDesc: Let us source and screen top talent for your permanent roles.

faq.q1: What types of jobs do you staff in {city}?
faq.a1: We specialize in Manufacturing, Warehouse, Light Industrial, Clerical/Office, and Construction Support roles in the {city} area.
faq.q2: How fast can you fill an order?
faq.a2: We typically fill urgent orders within 24-48 hours. Our pool of pre-screened candidates is ready to work.
faq.a3: Yes! Temp-to-hire is a great way to reduce hiring risk. You can evaluate a worker's performance on the job before hiring them directly.
faq.a4: We conduct identity verification, E-Verify work eligibility checks, background checks, drug screening (on request), and skills assessments.
faq.a5: Employees are paid weekly via direct deposit or pay card, ensuring they stay motivated and reliable.
faq.q6: Which nearby areas do you serve?
faq.a6: We serve {city} and the surrounding communities in {state}. Contact us to confirm if we cover your specific zip code.

faq.a: We have no strict minimum, but better pricing applies to volume orders.

faq.a: Often the same day or next day for general labor roles.
Yes, we cover all payroll taxes, unemployment, and workers' compensation insurance.

about.title: About Telliusco
about.missionText: To bridge the gap between hardworking people and essential businesses through speed, reliability, and honest communication.
values: Safety First: No job is worth an injury.
Integrity: We do what we say.
Speed: Time is money for our clients and workers.

contact.subtitle: We are here to help.
